DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Therapeutic Alliance Minimal Intervention Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Low back pain remain global public health problem . The classification patient low back pain subgroup aim optimize health system provide quantity type proper technique patient . Several factor may influence physical therapy . The therapeutic alliance may define harmony social connection therapist patient may influence treatment effect . The aim study evaluate effectiveness addition therapeutic alliance minimum intervention treatment chronic non-specific low back pain low risk psychosocial factor .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients wait treatment wait list physical therapy clinic Diagnosis chronic nonspecific low back pain ( 12 week ) More 18 year Able read write Portuguese language Low risk psychosocial factor ( less 3 point STarT Back Screening Tool ) . Exclusion criterion Spine surgery history Nerve root compromise Cognitive impairment relate disorder Pregnants
